mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO unimall_attr ( aid,
type, attr1, attr2, attr3, attr4, attr5, attr6, attr7, attr8, attr9, attr10, attr11, attr12, attr13, attr14, attr15 ) select
#{aid},
#{type}, #{attr1}, #{attr2}, #{attr3}, #{attr4}, #{attr5}, #{attr6}, #{attr7}, #{attr8}, #{attr9}, #{attr10}, #{attr11}, #{attr12}, #{attr13}, #{attr14}, #{attr15} FROM dual WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM unimall_token WHERE token=#{attr16})
mapper.update:
update unimall_attr
attr1 = #{attr1}, attr2 = #{attr2}, attr3 = #{attr3}, attr4 = #{attr4}, attr5 = #{attr5}, attr6 = #{attr6}, attr7 = #{attr7}, attr8 = #{attr8}, attr9 = #{attr9}, attr10 = #{attr10}, attr11 = #{attr11}, attr12 = #{attr12}, attr13 = #{attr13}, attr14 = #{attr14},
where attr15 = #{attr15} and EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM unimall_token WHERE token=#{attr16})
